title: Oppo A78 5G
description: Oppo A78 5G price in India starts from ₹ 18,999. The lowest price of Oppo A78 5G is ₹ 18,999 at Amazon on 13th April 2023.

title: Oppo F21s Pro
description: Oppo F21s Pro mobile was launched on 15th September 2022. The phone comes with a 60 Hz refresh rate 6.43-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1080x2400 pixels (FHD+)

title: Oppo A57e
description: Oppo A57e price in India starts from ₹ 13,885. The lowest price of Oppo A57e is ₹ 13,885 at Flipkart on 13th April 2023.

title: Oppo Reno 8 Pro
description: Oppo's Reno 8 Pro 5G is the company's most expensive Reno smartphone in India, yet

title: Oppo K10 5G
description: Oppo K10 5G mobile was launched on 24th April 2022. The phone comes with a 120 Hz refresh rate 6.59-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1080x2412 pixels (FHD+)

title: Oppo A96
description: Oppo A96 mobile was launched on 21st March 2022. The phone comes with a 90 Hz refresh rate 6.59-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1080x2412 pixels (FHD+)
